member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.DefaultDeviceName
member.summary: Default audio device name

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.Devices
member.summary: List with the names of the available audio devices (use these names to change current Device for all the players or for each player seperately)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.Device
member.summary: Audio device name which will be used for all the audio players (see Devices for valid input names)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.VolumeMaster
member.summary: Gets or sets the master's volume (valid values 0 - 100)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.MuteMaster
member.summary: Gets or sets the master's volume mute

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.VolumeSession
member.summary: Gets or sets the session's volume (valid values 0 - 100)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.AudioMaster.MuteSession
member.summary: Gets or sets the session's volume mute

member.name: T:FlyleafLib.Config
member.summary: Player's main configuration

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Player.LowLatency
member.summary: Sets playback mode to low latency (video only)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Player.LowLatencyMaxVideoFrames
member.summary: Limit before dropping frames. Lower value means lower latency (>=1)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Player.LowLatencyMaxVideoPackets
member.summary: Limit before dropping frames. Lower value means lower latency (>=0)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.AllowInterrupts
member.summary: Whether to enable demuxer's custom interrupt callback (for timeouts and interrupts)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.AllowReadInterrupts
member.summary: Whether to allow interrupts during av_read_frame

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.AllowTimeouts
member.summary: Whether to allow timeouts checks within the interrupts callback

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.ExcludeInterruptFmts
member.summary: List of FFmpeg formats to be excluded from interrupts

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.MinQueueSize
member.summary: Minimum required demuxed packets before playing

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Maximum allowed packets for buffering

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.MaxErrors
member.summary: Maximum allowed errors before stopping

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.CloseTimeout
member.summary: avformat_close_input timeout (ticks) for protocols that support interrupts

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.OpenTimeout
member.summary: avformat_open_input + avformat_find_stream_info timeout (ticks) for protocols that support interrupts (should be related to probesize/analyzeduration)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.ReadTimeout
member.summary: av_read_frame timeout (ticks) for protocols that support interrupts

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.SeekTimeout
member.summary: av_seek_frame timeout (ticks) for protocols that support interrupts

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.FormatFlags
member.summary: FFmpeg's format flags for demuxer (see https://ffmpeg.org/doxygen/trunk/avformat_8h.html) eg. FormatFlags |= 0x40; // For AVFMT_FLAG_NOBUFFER

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Demuxer.FormatOpt
member.summary: FFmpeg's format options for demuxer

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Decoder.HWAcceleration
member.summary: Activates Direct3D video acceleration (decoding)

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Decoder.VideoThreads
member.summary: Threads that will be used from the decoder

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Decoder.MinVideoFrames
member.summary: Minimum required video frames before playing

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Decoder.MinAudioFrames
member.summary: Minimum required audio frames before playing

member.summary: Maximum audio frames to be decoded and processed for playback

member.summary: Maximum subtitle frames to be decoded

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Decoder.MaxErrors
member.summary: Maximum allowed errors before stopping

member.summary: Custom aspect ratio (AspectRatio must be set to Custom to have an effect)

member.summary: Video aspect ratio

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Video.ClearColor
member.summary: Backcolor of the player's surface

member.summary: Whether audio should be enabled or not

member.name: P:FlyleafLib.Config.Audio.LatencyTicks
member.summary: NAudio's latency (required buffered duration before playing)

member.summary: Audio languages preference by priority

member.summary: Audio delay ticks (will be parsed in current active stream and will be resetted on each new input)

member.summary: Subtitle languages preference by priority

member.summary: Registers FFmpeg libraries (ensure you provide x86 or x64 based on your project)
member.param: Provide your custom absolute path or :1 for current or :2 for Libs\(x86 or x64 dynamic)\FFmpeg from current to base
FFmpeg's verbosity (24: Warning, 64: Max offset ...) (used only in DEBUG)

member.summary: Downloads or remuxes to different format any ffmpeg valid input url

member.summary: The backend demuxer. Access this to enable the required streams for downloading

member.summary: The backend remuxer. Normally you shouldn't access this

member.summary: The current timestamp of the frame starting from 0 (Ticks)

member.summary: The total duration of the input (Ticks)

member.summary: The percentage of the current download process (0 for live streams)

member.summary: Fires on download completed or failed

member.summary: Opens the demuxer and fills streams info
member.param: The filename or url to open

member.name: M:FlyleafLib.MediaFramework.MediaContext.Downloader.Download(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the currently configured AVS streams
member.param: The filename for the downloaded video. The file extension will let the demuxer to choose the output format (eg. mp4).

member.name: M:FlyleafLib.MediaFramework.MediaContext.Downloader.Dispose
member.summary: Stops and disposes the downloader

member.returns: The requested VideoFrame or null on failure

member.summary: Demuxes until the next valid video frame (will be stored in AVFrame* frame)

member.summary: Demuxes until the a valid packet within EnabledStreams or the specified stream (Will be stored in AVPacket* packet)
member.param: Find packets only for the specified stream index

if true, all pids are analyzed to find streams
compute exact PCR for each transport stream packet
